actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1401a(e) of title 10, United States Code, to preclude a military member from receiving less retired pay by continued active service.

summary.text: Requires the payment of retirement pay for members of the armed forces who became entitled to such pay on or after October 1, 1967, so as to preclude such a military member from receiving less retired pay by continued active service. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1401a(e))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1401a(e) of title 10, United States Code, to preclude a military member from receiving less retired pay by continued active service.
